languages.text: {n}Молодой человек выпячивает грудь колесом и обижено задирает нос.{/n} "Какие еще переодевания, дамочка? Сказано вам — это {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}ксеносы{/g}, опасные, беспощадные и злобные твари! Если не разбираетесь в вопросе, будьте любезны не вводить в заблуждение и мою публику!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Молодой человек выпячивает грудь колесом и обижено задирает нос.{/n} "Какие еще переодевания, дамочка? Сказано вам — это ксеносы, опасные, беспощадные и злобные твари! Если не разбираетесь в вопросе, будьте любезны не вводить в заблуждение и мою публику!"

languages.text: {n}The man puffs out his chest and turns up his nose, his pride clearly wounded.{/n} "What guises, lady? I'm telling you, these are {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} — dangerous, merciless, vicious beasts! If they aren't your area of expertise, please kindly refrain from misinforming my audience!"
languages.original_text: {n}Молодой человек выпячивает грудь колесом и обижено задирает нос.{/n} "Какие еще переодевания, дамочка? Сказано вам — это {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}ксеносы{/g}, опасные, беспощадные и злобные твари! Если не разбираетесь в вопросе, будьте любезны не вводить в заблуждение и мою публику!"

{n}The man puffs out his chest and turns up his nose, his pride clearly wounded.{/n} "What guises, lady? I'm telling you, these are {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} — dangerous, merciless, vicious beasts! If they aren't your area of expertise, please kindly refrain from misinforming my audience!"

languages.text: {n}男はプライドを傷つけられたかのように胸を前に張り、顎をくいと上げた。{/n}「真似るとはなんだあ？こいつらは{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}異種族{/g}だぞ。危険で冷酷で狂暴なケダモノだ！専門家でもないなら私の観客に誤った情報を伝えるのを控えていただきたいものだね！」
languages.original_text: {n}The man puffs out his chest and turns up his nose, his pride clearly wounded.{/n} "What guises, lady? I'm telling you, these are {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} — dangerous, merciless, vicious beasts! If they aren't your area of expertise, please kindly refrain from misinforming my audience!"

traits.locale_text: {n}男はプライドを傷つけられたかのように胸を前に張り、顎をくいと上げた。{/n}「真似るとはなんだあ？こいつらは{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}異種族{/g}だぞ。危険で冷酷で狂暴なケダモノだ！専門家でもないなら私の観客に誤った情報を伝えるのを控えていただきたいものだね！」

languages.text: {n}那个男人挺起胸膛，仰起了头。很显然，他的自尊心受到了伤害。{/n}“你在说什么伪装呢，女士？我告诉你，这些都是{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}异形{/g}，是危险、无情、恶毒的野兽！如果这方面不是你的专业领域，就请不要误导我的客人！”
languages.original_text: {n}The man puffs out his chest and turns up his nose, his pride clearly wounded.{/n} "What guises, lady? I'm telling you, these are {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} — dangerous, merciless, vicious beasts! If they aren't your area of expertise, please kindly refrain from misinforming my audience!"

traits.locale_text: {n}那个男人挺起胸膛，仰起了头。很显然，他的自尊心受到了伤害。{/n}“你在说什么伪装呢，女士？我告诉你，这些都是{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}异形{/g}，是危险、无情、恶毒的野兽！如果这方面不是你的专业领域，就请不要误导我的客人！”

languages.text: {n}El hombre saca pecho y levanta la nariz, con el orgullo claramente herido.{/n} «¿De qué disfraces habla, señora? Le digo que son {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g}, ¡unas bestias peligrosas, malvadas y sanguinarias! Si no son su especialidad, ¡no desinforme al público!».
languages.original_text: {n}The man puffs out his chest and turns up his nose, his pride clearly wounded.{/n} "What guises, lady? I'm telling you, these are {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} — dangerous, merciless, vicious beasts! If they aren't your area of expertise, please kindly refrain from misinforming my audience!"

traits.locale_text: {n}El hombre saca pecho y levanta la nariz, con el orgullo claramente herido.{/n} «¿De qué disfraces habla, señora? Le digo que son {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g}, ¡unas bestias peligrosas, malvadas y sanguinarias! Si no son su especialidad, ¡no desinforme al público!».

languages.text: {n}Visiblement indigné par ces propos, l'homme bombe le torse.{/n} « Se travestir ? Madame, il s'agit là d'authentiques {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xénos{/g}, dangereux, impitoyables et cruels ! Si vous n'êtes pas capable de le reconnaître, je vous prierai de ne pas induire mon public en erreur ! »
languages.original_text: {n}The man puffs out his chest and turns up his nose, his pride clearly wounded.{/n} "What guises, lady? I'm telling you, these are {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} — dangerous, merciless, vicious beasts! If they aren't your area of expertise, please kindly refrain from misinforming my audience!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Visiblement indigné par ces propos, l'homme bombe le torse.{/n} « Se travestir ? Madame, il s'agit là d'authentiques {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xénos{/g}, dangereux, impitoyables et cruels ! Si vous n'êtes pas capable de le reconnaître, je vous prierai de ne pas induire mon public en erreur ! »

languages.text: {n}Der Mann bläht die Brust auf und reckt die Nase nach oben, offensichtlich in seinem Stolz verletzt.{/n} "Wieso verkleiden, werte Dame? Ich sage Euch, das hier sind {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}Xenos{/g} – gefährliche, gnadenlose, bösartige Bestien! Wenn Ihr Euch damit nicht auskennt, gebt bitte meinem Publikum keine falschen Informationen!"
languages.original_text: {n}The man puffs out his chest and turns up his nose, his pride clearly wounded.{/n} "What guises, lady? I'm telling you, these are {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} — dangerous, merciless, vicious beasts! If they aren't your area of expertise, please kindly refrain from misinforming my audience!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Mann bläht die Brust auf und reckt die Nase nach oben, offensichtlich in seinem Stolz verletzt.{/n} "Wieso verkleiden, werte Dame? Ich sage Euch, das hier sind {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}Xenos{/g} – gefährliche, gnadenlose, bösartige Bestien! Wenn Ihr Euch damit nicht auskennt, gebt bitte meinem Publikum keine falschen Informationen!"

languages.text: {n}Adam göğsünü kabartıp burnunu havaya kaldırıyor. Gururunun incindiği bariz.{/n} "Ne kılığı hanımefendi? Size bunlar {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}zeno{/g} diyorum. Tehlikeli, acımasız, vahşi canavarlar! Eğer uzmanlık alanınız değillerse rica ediyorum, lütfen seyircileri yanlış bilgilendirmekten sakının!"
languages.original_text: {n}The man puffs out his chest and turns up his nose, his pride clearly wounded.{/n} "What guises, lady? I'm telling you, these are {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} — dangerous, merciless, vicious beasts! If they aren't your area of expertise, please kindly refrain from misinforming my audience!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Adam göğsünü kabartıyor ve burnunu havaya kaldırıyor. Gururunun incindiği belli.{/n} "Ne kılığı leydim? Size bunlar {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}zeno{/g} diyorum; tehlikeli, acımasız, vahşi hayvanlar! Eğer uzmanlık alanınız değillerse rica ediyorum, lütfen seyircileri yanlış bilgilendirmekten sakının!"
